item.title: 私人信贷进入风险地带，向消费者下巨额赌注
item.description:
随着银行的撤退，企业正在消费者贷款市场中抢占更大的份额。但最近的经济动荡和失业数据显示了潜在的危险。【原文：

Firms are grabbing a greater share of the consumer lending markets as banks retreat. But recent economic wobbles and jobless data show the potential perils. 

】

item.title: 中国人民银行警告潜在风险，中国债券跌幅扩大
item.description: 中国 10 年期国债延续近期跌势，央行警告债市持续上涨可能带来市场风险。【原文：China’s 10-year bonds extended recent declines as the central bank warned about potential market risks arising from the relentless rally in the debt market.】

item.title: 外国投资者从中国撤出的资金创历史新高
item.description: 上一季度，外国投资者从中国撤出了创纪录的大量资金，跌幅为历史第二，这很可能反映了对世界第二大经济体的严重悲观情绪。【原文：Foreign investors pulled a record amount of money from China last quarter, with the second-only fall on record likely reflecting deep pessimism about the world’s second-largest economy.】

item.title: 中国建筑商凯撒力争在四周内敲定重组条款
item.description: 凯撒集团控股有限公司（Kaisa Group Holdings Ltd.）计划在一个月内达成重组协议，因为这家陷入困境的中国建筑商将在四周后再次就清算申请进行抗辩。【原文：Kaisa Group Holdings Ltd. plans to come up with a restructuring agreement within a month, as the troubled Chinese builder is set to defend against a liquidation petition again in four weeks.】

item.title: 印度股市在兴登堡-塞比之争中开局不温不火
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 担心重回股票全仓的交易员在权衡期权
item.description: 在经历了近期市场历史上最疯狂的一周之后，S&P 500 指数创下了自 2022 年以来最大的单日跌幅和最好的反弹，交易者不想重新完全投入股市是可以理解的。有些人现在正在研究期权。【原文：After one of the wildest weeks in recent market history — the S&P 500 Index posted both its biggest one-day slump and best rebound since 2022 — traders could be forgiven for not wanting to jump back in fully into stocks. Some are now are looking into options.】

item.title: 普拉博沃承诺继续建设印尼新首都
item.description: 印尼当选总统普拉博沃-苏比安托（Prabowo Subianto）表示，他将致力于 "继续并在可能的情况下完成 "新首都的建设，从而消除了即将上任的领导人是否会放弃其前任耗资数十亿美元的项目以推行自己的政策议程的不确定性。【原文：Indonesia’s President-Elect Prabowo Subianto said he is committed to “continue, and if possible finish” the new capital, dispelling uncertainty as to whether the incoming leader will abandon the multibillion-dollar project of his predecessor to pursue his own policy agenda.】

item.title: 中国快速扩充电池群，但需要开始使用电池
item.description: 中国正在加紧建设电池存储系统，以使电网能够应对风能和太阳能发电场间歇性发电量的快速增长。但要真正利用好这项技术，中国需要确保它们得到更频繁的使用。【原文：China is rushing to build battery-storage systems to allow electricity grids to cope with rapid increases in intermittent power generation from wind and solar farms. But to truly capitalize on the technology, it needs to ensure they’re used more frequently.】

item.title: 美国通胀数据公布前黄金持稳，衰退担忧挥之不去
item.description: 在本周美国重要数据公布之前，黄金走势趋稳，交易商关注这些数据是否会加强美联储不久将转向宽松货币政策的押注。【原文：Gold steadied ahead of key US data prints this week, with traders focused on whether they will reinforce bets the Federal Reserve will soon pivot to monetary easing.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事亚洲
item.description: 兴登堡指责印度最高监管机构存在利益冲突。菲律宾抨击中国 "非法 "动用空军。亚洲股市开盘涨跌不一。以下是您今天需要了解的信息。【原文：Hindenburg accuses India’s top regulator of conflict of interest. Philippines blasts China for “illegal” air force moves. Asian stocks set for a mixed start. Here’s what you need to know today.】

item.title: 交易商关注伊朗报复，石油周线收涨后保持稳定
item.description: 由于市场仍在等待伊朗对上个月哈马斯领导人在德黑兰遇刺事件的回应，石油自 7 月初以来首次出现周涨幅，之后保持稳定。【原文：Oil was steady after its first weekly gain since early July, with the market still waiting for Iran’s response to last month’s assassination of a Hamas leader in Tehran.】

item.title: 印度将逼近中国，成为新兴市场股锚
item.description: 在摩根士丹利资本国际公司（MSCI Inc.【原文：India is poised to narrow the gap with China in MSCI Inc.’s gauge for developing nations.】

item.title: 亚洲股市开局不一，波动性减弱：市场综述
item.description: 亚洲股市周一开盘涨跌不一，交易商在经历了八月的震荡开局后，将焦点转向了本周公布的关键美国数据。【原文：Asian stocks were poised for a mixed open on Monday as traders shifted focus to key US data prints this week after a volatile start to August.】

item.title: 降息前景黯淡，菲律宾比索情绪高涨
item.description: 菲律宾比索将延续涨势，因为通胀意外回升抑制了本周降息的可能性。【原文：The Philippine peso is set to extend gains after an unexpected pickup in inflation damped the possibility of a an interest-rate cut this week.】

item.title: 套利交易爆炸困扰着因急速平仓而受到冲击的市场
item.description: 现在看来，上周一的全球市场崩溃更像是一次短暂的震荡，是日本央行政策小幅调整和美国经济衰退担忧重现引发的短暂恐慌。【原文：By now, last Monday’s global market meltdown looks more like a brief tremor, a fleeting panic unleashed by a small policy shift from the Bank of Japan and resurgent fears of a US recession.】

item.title: 对冲基金嗅到血腥味，放贷人自相残杀
item.description:
所谓的 "债权人对债权人的暴力 "已经达到了如此地步，以至于各家基金都将数百亿美元的赌注押在了趁火打劫上。【原文：

So-called ‘creditor on creditor violence’ has reached such a pitch that funds are wagering tens of billions of dollars on taking advantage of the mayhem. 

】

item.title: 本周全球商品市场值得关注的五大图表
item.description: 铜库存正在膨胀，而美国原油库存继续连续下降。欧洲天然气价格在地缘政治动荡中反弹，而美国两种主要农作物的产量预计将超过之前的预期。【原文：Copper inventories are swelling, while US crude stockpiles are continuing a streak of declines. European natural gas prices have rallied amid geopolitical turmoil, and two key US crops are expected to be coming in bigger than previously projected.】

item.title: 令企业招聘人员担忧的三大 C 级趋势
item.description:
此外，我们还将与诺和诺德财务总监卡斯滕-蒙克-克努森（Karsten Munk Knudsen）进行对话。【原文：

Plus, a conversation with Novo Nordisk finance chief Karsten Munk Knudsen.

】

item.title: 债券在多年辜负投资者之后重新成为避险工具
item.description: 格雷格-阿贝拉（Gregg Abella）是新泽西州的一名基金经理，他没有想到在过去的一周里，他接到了大量客户的电话。"突然有人对我们说，'哇，你认为现在是我们增加债券的好时机吗？【原文：Gregg Abella, a money manager in New Jersey, wasn’t expecting the flood of phone calls he got from clients this past week. “Suddenly people are saying to us, ‘Wow, do you think it’s a good time for us to add bonds?”】

item.title: 官方称降雨充沛，伊拉克小麦产量增长 21
item.description: 一位官员说，伊拉克今年的小麦产量达到 630 万吨，年增长率近 21%，标志着伊拉克第二年实现了粮食自给自足。【原文：Iraq’s wheat output hit 6.3 million tons this year, an almost 21% annual increase that marked a second year of self-sufficiency in the grain, an official said.】

item.title: 林德纳告诉丰克，欧盟债务规则不允许德国大举扩张
item.description: 财政部长克里斯蒂安-林德纳（Christian Lindner）告诉《Funke Mediengruppe》，欧盟的赤字规定不适合德国的大手大脚。【原文：The European Union’s deficit rules don’t accommodate German spending largesse, Finance Minister Christian Lindner told Funke Mediengruppe.】

item.title: 巴西飞机失事的飞行和语音数据被提取出来进行调查
item.description: 一名政府航空官员说，在调查人员调查造成机上人员全部遇难的事故原因时，从一架在巴西坠毁的飞机上提取的飞行和语音数据盒 "100%成功"。【原文：Flight and voice data boxes from a plane that crashed in Brazil have been extracted with “100% success,” a government aviation official said, as investigators probe the cause of an accident that killed everyone on board.】

item.title: 美国炼油企业放缓，引发全球原油供应过剩担忧
item.description: 本季度，美国一些顶级炼油厂正在缩减其设施的运营，这加剧了人们对全球原油供应过剩正在形成的担忧。【原文：Some of the top US oil refiners are throttling back operations at their facilities this quarter, adding to concerns that a global glut of crude is forming.】

item.title: 赞比亚关闭与刚果的边境，阻断重要的铜贸易路线
item.description: 赞比亚政府周末表示，赞比亚已暂时关闭了与刚果民主共和国的边境，此举可能会推迟非洲最大铜生产国的出口。【原文：Zambia has temporarily shut its borders with the Democratic Republic of Congo, the government said at the weekend, in a move that could delay exports from Africa’s biggest copper producer.】

item.title: 面对伊朗袭击风险，以色列加强基础设施防御
item.description: 市长们准备好了电池支持的警报器，急救人员有了卫星电话，如果人们需要进入避难所，老式晶体管收音机可以成为信息生命线。【原文：Mayors have battery-backed sirens ready, first-responders got satellite phones and old-fashioned transistor radios could be an information lifeline if people need to move into shelters.】

item.title: 交易员押注剧烈波动，CPI数据将考验市场
item.description: 华尔街这个令人难以忘怀的夏天正接近高潮，所有人都在关注本周的消费者物价报告，交易员们希望这份报告将为美联储在 9 月份的下次会议上开始降息提供所需的弹药。【原文：Wall Street’s summer to forget is approaching its climax, with all eyes on this week’s consumer prices report, which traders hope will give the Federal Reserve the ammunition it needs to begin cutting interest rates at its next meeting in September.】

item.title: 沙特改革投资法以吸引外资
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯宣布了旨在提高透明度和简化在沙特投资流程的新商业法规，以吸引更多外国资本支持经济多样化。【原文：Saudi Arabia announced new business regulations aimed at boosting transparency and easing the process of investing in the kingdom as it looks to attract more foreign capital to support economic diversification.】

item.title: 金属成本飙升后，奥运金牌比以往更值钱了
item.description: 在今年的巴黎奥运会上，奥运金牌比以往任何时候都更值钱，每块金牌的原材料都有可能卖到约 900 美元。【原文：Olympic gold medals are worth more than ever at this year’s Paris games, with the raw materials that go into them having the potential to fetch about $900 each.】

item.title: Logan 和 KWG 为 10 亿美元债务融资获得再融资
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，中国不良资产开发商洛根集团有限公司（Logan Group Co.【原文：Chinese distressed developers Logan Group Co. and KWG Group Holdings Ltd. have secured a private loan to refinance a facility of over $1 billion that’s backed by luxury real estate in Hong Kong, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 伊朗新总统在内阁选举中任命石油部长
item.description: 据半官方的伊朗学生通讯社报道，前国营伊朗国家石油公司副董事长穆赫森-帕克内贾德（Mohsen Paknejad）已被任命为伊朗新任石油部长。【原文：Mohsen Paknejad, a former deputy in the state-run National Iranian Oil Co., has been named as Iran’s new oil minister, the semi-official Iranian Students’ News Agency reported.】
